attributes.action: introduce a law which requires that any policeman or community support officer who orders a cyclist off a pavement, where that cyclist thereafter becomes the victim of a cyclist/motor car collision, where there is no formal cycle path, shall be liable to prosecution for causing the collision to take place because they ordered the cylist off the pavement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because there are no cycle paths and because motorists see cyclists as a target, as opposed to an equal status road user, any policeman or community support officer who orders a cyclist off the pavement is sentencing that cyclist to possible death.  There has to be recourse through the courts for the families of cyclists so injured or killed.
